title: The 7 Habits of Highly Effective Teens
description: Bestselling author Sean Covey offers this engaging guide to help teens with the tough issues and life-changing decisions they face. The 7 Habits of Highly Effective Teens offers step-by-step advice for improving their self-image, building friendships, resisting peer pressure, achieving their goals, getting along with their parents, and much more. In addition, the book is stuffed - Fun cartoons- Clever ideas- Great quotes- Incredible stories about real teens all over the world- And more! An indispensable book for adolescents, as well as parents, grandparents, and any adult who influences the young.
author: Sean Covey
